column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Many reviews noted the long wait time for the pizza. It's a deep dish pizza so it takes longer to bake. They might have tried to prep the pie
column2: but still the pizza is quite thick and hence longer time in the oven. To wait less
column3: order your pizza right after you put your name down in the waiting list. That way
column4: you would only wait for 15mins or so for your pizza. You can order other items on the menu when you get and sit at your table.
